name: Wall
description: The Wall class represents a wall in a Revit project.

properties.name: Location
properties.description: Gets the location of the wall.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: Gets the width of the wall.

properties.name: WallType
properties.description: Gets or sets the wall type.

properties.name: Orientation
properties.description: Gets the orientation of the wall.

properties.name: Flipped
properties.description: Gets or sets whether the wall is flipped.

properties.name: Length
properties.description: Gets the length of the wall.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: Gets the height of the wall.

methods.name: Create(Document, Curve, ElementId, ElementId, Double, Double, Boolean, Boolean)
GetWallLayers()
methods.description: Gets the layers of the wall.

methods.name: SetCompoundStructure(CompoundStructure)
methods.description: Sets the compound structure of the wall.
